author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...MELISSA REMAINS DISORGANIZED AND JOGGING SLOWLY WESTWARD... ...HEAVY RAINFALL AND FLOODING EXPECTED OVER PORTIONS OF HISPANIOLA AND JAMAICA OVER THE REMAINDER OF THIS WEEK...
summary: ...MELISSA REMAINS DISORGANIZED AND JOGGING SLOWLY WESTWARD... ...HEAVY RAINFALL AND FLOODING EXPECTED OVER PORTIONS OF HISPANIOLA AND JAMAICA OVER THE REMAINDER OF THIS WEEK... As of 2:00 PM EDT Wed Oct 22 the center of Melissa was located near 14.3, -74.0 with movement W at 2 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1000 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...MELISSA REMAINS DISORGANIZED AND JOGGING SLOWLY WESTWARD... ...HEAVY RAINFALL AND FLOODING EXPECTED OVER PORTIONS OF HISPANIOLA AND JAMAICA OVER THE REMAINDER OF THIS WEEK... As of 2:00 PM EDT Wed Oct 22 the center of Melissa was located near 14.3, -74.0 with movement W at 2 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1000 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Melissa (AT3/AL132025)
